moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Chief Hakoda
characters.description: Katara's and Sokka's dad, great dad energy, probably where Sokka's dad jokes came from

moves.name: OG Dad Joke
moves.description: Chief Hakoda makes a dad joke but it's better than Sokka's dad jokes because it's OG

moves.name: Ocean Motion
moves.description: Chief Hakoda pushes the ocean to create a powerful wall of water

moves.name: Rainbow
moves.description: Chief Hakoda creates a distracting rainbow with the mist in the air

moves.name: Water Trident
moves.description: Chief Hakoda creates a water trident the pierces through his opponent

new moves.name: Water Trident
new moves.description: Aang launches a water trident at his opponent
